mapper.sql: A.id as A_id, A.user_name as A_user_name, A.password as A_password, A.salt as A_salt, A.email as A_email, A.phone as A_phone, A.short_name as A_short_name, A.channel_code as A_channel_code, A.agent_no as A_agent_no, A.merchant_no as A_merchant_no,A.identity_No as A_identity_no, A.identity_flag as A_identity_flag, A.status as A_status, A.create_time as A_create_time,A.open_id as A_open_id

sql.if:
EXISTS ( SELECT n.current_node FROM t_node_relation n WHERE
n.identity_flag = '${params.identityFlag}' and
n.node_seq like '%' and
n.node_seq like CONCAT('${params.nodeSeq}','%') and
A.identity_no = n.current_node) AND

mapper.select: select ,C.description as role_name,E.channel_name,D.agent_name,F.merchant_name from t_channel_admin A left join t_channel_role_user B on A.id = B.account_id left join t_channel_role C on B.role_id = C.id left join t_channel_base E on A.channel_code = E.channel_no left join t_agent_base D on A.agent_no = D.agent_no left join t_merchant_info F on A.merchant_no = F.merchant_no where A.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from t_channel_admin A left join t_channel_role_user B on A.id = B.account_id left join t_channel_role C on B.role_id = C.id left join t_channel_base E on A.channel_code = E.channel_no
mapper.update:
update t_channel_admin A
A.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.salt = #{record.salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT},
A.email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.phone = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.short_name = #{record.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.channel_code = #{record.channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.agent_no = #{record.agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.merchant_no = #{record.merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.identity_no = #{record.identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.open_id = #{record.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.identity_flag = #{record.identityFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_channel_admin A
A.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
A.email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.short_name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.merchant_no = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.identity_no = #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.identity_flag = #{identityFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where A.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_channel_admin A where A.identity_no not in (select identity_no from t_wechat_user) and A.open_id!=id limit #{start},#{end}
select count(1) from t_channel_admin A where A.identity_no not in ( select identity_no from t_wechat_user ) and A.open_id!=id

select
from t_channel_admin A where 1=1
and A.merchant_no=#{merchantNo} and identity_flag='3'
and A.identity_no=#{merchantNo}
and A.open_id<>A.id

select from t_channel_admin A where A.identity_no=#{identityNo}
and A.open_id<>A.id
